item.name: get all scenario versions for a scenario group
get one scenario version for a scenario group

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Card activation",
    "category": "Card",
    "tags": [
        "Card",
        "Process",
        "Welcome"
    ],
    "description": "Scenario to activate a card",
    "enabled": false
}

item.name: create one scenario version on a specific scenario group (the payload is an example, you need to create answers and intents in frontend to have the associated elements, otherwise you wil get error like removed intents or answers)
import multiple scenario versions to a scenario group

body.raw:
{
    "id": "640f5007c8e3b87bf49203be",
    "category": "Card",
    "description": "Scenario to activate a card  ",
    "name": "Card activation",
    "tags": [
        "Card",
        "Process",
        "Welcoming"
    ],
    "enabled": null
}
